940601-d-06-01-94-PW.Primary Accident Cause: Wide gage (due to defective or missing crossties)

940601-d-06-01-94-PW.Narrative: TRAIN PR-3 WITH THE LOCOMOTIVE PW 2008 IN LEAD FOLLOWED BY 15 LOADED CARS, AND TRAILING LOCOMOTIVE PW 2011 WAS TRAVELING WEST ON TRACK #7 ON AMTRAK. PR-3 WAS TRAVELING APPROX. 10 MILES PER HOUR, THE TRAIN NEGOTIATED A CURVE IN THE TRACK JUST EAST OF THE MAINTENANCE BASE WHEN THE TRAIN REAR AXLE OF THE 15TH CAR PW 20005 A GONDOLA LOAD OF SCRAP DROPPED INTO THE GAUGE OF THE TRACK. THE LOCOMOTIVE PW2011 FOLLOWING THE GONDOLA CAR STARTED DIGGING INTO THE TIES UNTIL IT HIT AN OLD SWITCH WHICH HAD BEEN REMOVED EXCEPT FOR THE POINTS AND PART OF THE SIDE TRACK. THE LOCOMOTIVE WENT TOWARDS THE OLD SIDE TRACK AND A PIECE OF THE RAIL PUNCTURED THE FUEL TANK AT THE BOTTOM REAR RIGHT SIDE. THE FUEL TANKHAD 1,500 GALLONS OF FUEL WHICH WAS RECORDED BY THE CREW BEFORE THEY LEFT THEIR INITIAL TERMINAL INVALLEY FALLS, RHODE ISLAND. ALL OF THE FUEL SPILLED, APPROX. 800 GALLONS WAS RECOVERED BY CLEAN HARBORS CO. THE LOCOMOTIVE SUBSTAINED MAJOR DAMAGE TO ITS TRUCKS AND UNDER CARRIAGE. THE PW 20005 GONDOLA CAR WAS NOT DAMAGED AND WAS RE-RAILED, INSPECTED AND RETURNED TO SERVICE. THE CAUSE OF THE DERAILMENT WAS DETERMINED TO BE WIDE GAUGE DO TO DEFECTIVE OR MISSING CROSSTIES.NoneNoneNone
